channel.title: Hex Editor
channel.description:
I remember some type of program that let you edit the cache. I think it was something like a bit editor. Does anyone else know what I'm talking about I can't seem to remember it. :|
The program lets you change text inside the cache. It's not Tom Suite Editor
EDIT: I found the program [url=http://www.softcircuits.com/dl/apps/cygnusfe.zip]here[/url]
The purpose for it is [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367142]here[/url]

item.title: Hex Editor
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2, topic:457786”]So instead of sending new text from the server, this allows you to edit it directly in the cache?[/quote]Exactly that and also interface colors can be edited like changing yellow text to orange.

Read full topic
